name: Wanderer's Troupe
flower_description: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.
feather_description: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.
sand_description: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.
goblet_description: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which plays a wondrous tune as the water flows out.
circlet_description: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.
four_pc_bonus: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.
